<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Linguist Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1993) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=41" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 178 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Linguist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=64)

**Prerequisites**
you speak at least three languages

</column>

---

You have studied languages and their development. You become trained in [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14); if you were already trained in Society, you instead become an expert in Society. You gain the [Multilingual](/Feats.aspx?ID=814) skill feat twice.

**Special** You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the linguist archetype.

<title level="2">Linguist Dedication leads to...</title>
[Analyze Idiolect](/Feats.aspx?ID=1997), [Crude Communication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1999), [Multilingual Cipher](/Feats.aspx?ID=1994), [Phonetic Training](/Feats.aspx?ID=1995), [Read Shibboleths](/Feats.aspx?ID=1998), [Spot Translate](/Feats.aspx?ID=1996)
